raw_text: Drawing on the feature sets used in Connolly et al (1997) and Ge et al (1998), we believe the following factors might indicate co-referenco:? Semantic role (e.g. indicating location, manner, time, ...),? Nesting depth of an N ' P (an integer),? Information status (as defined by Strube (1998)) of the DE,? Gender, Number, Animacy
